'''Alpha v1.0.17''',<ref>{{link|url=http://web.archive.org/web/20180522125714/https://forum.facepunch.com/f/games/twaf/Minecraft-V35-Ultimate-Edition/49/#postseajd|title=Minecraft V35 - Ultimate Edition!, page 49|website=Facepunch Forums|date=August 20, 2010}}</ref> also known as '''Seecret Friday 8''', is the eighth [[Seecret Update]], released on August 20, 2010<ref>[[wordofnotch:982299297|Seecret Friday 8! OooooOOOoo!]] – The Word of Notch, August 20, 2010</ref>, at 13:05 UTC<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-08-20_#minecraft.log|"09:05:10 <Notch> ok, server and client are updated"}}</ref> which added [[fence]]s and [[spider jockey]]s.

== Additions ==
{{Additions table|Oak Fence}}

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Oak Fence (EW) JE1.png|32px]] [[Fence]]s'''<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-08-20_#minecraft.log|"09:07:28 <Visiiri> Fences!"}}</ref>

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Spider Jockey JE1.png|32px]] [[Spider jockey]]s'''<ref>{{tweet|notch|21693262563|So skeleton archers riding giant jumping spiders is overpowered? Just wait until I add dragons!|August 20, 2010}}</ref><ref>https://www.neogaf.com/threads/minecraft-ot.401027/post-22924983</ref>
* The first [[jockey]] to be added into the game.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[File:Milk Bucket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Milk Bucket]]'''
* Сan now be emptied.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Chicken JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Chicken]]s'''
* No longer take fall damage and now slowly glide down using their wings.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Hotbar]]'''
{{Hotbar
|Oak Fence, 64
}}
* The [[player]] starts with 64 fences in the inventory<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-08-20_#minecraft.log|"09:09:18 <Visiiri> I started with 64 fences"..."09:10:29 <Kokopure> you start with fences now"}}</ref>
* Right clicking on usable blocks makes the player's arm swing to match the third person animation for right clicking.

'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* [[Chicken]]s, [[slime]]s<ref>http://i38.tinypic.com/svmmab.jpg</ref>{{Dead link|Image not properly archived}} and [[pig]]s added in multiplayer.
* Working [[day/night cycle]] in multiplayer.

'''[[Third person view]]'''
* Is now centered again.

=== General ===
'''[[Splash]]es'''
* Removed "Happy birthday! I love you! Alex x" special splash.

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* Items in inventory is invisible.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-08-20_#minecraft.log|"09:07:56 <bildramer> inventory is borked"..."09:08:01 <bildramer> most items are blank"..."09:08:33 <Sakaali> Noootch now i can't even see my tree texture in quickselect".."09:09:32 <Notch> did I break inventory? :-O"..."09:10:32 <saranis> inventory is broken"..."09:12:41 <Kokopure> I see zero amount of icons"}}</ref>

== Trivia ==
* Alpha v1.0.17 has the highest minor version number since Classic, at "17". The highest {{in|BE}} is "221", with [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.221]], and the highest in the full release of {{JE}} is "11", with [[Java Edition 1.21.11|1.21.11]].
* After release, this version was only available for 8 minutes, becoming the shortest lived [[Java Edition Alpha]] version.
